section.heading: Forfeiture and penalty for failure to produce.
section.text: If an officer or other person to whom a writ of habeas corpus is directed neglects or refuses to:

para.text: make return of the writ; or
bring the body of the person detained —

section.aftertext: according to the command of the writ, he shall forfeit to the person detained the sum of $500, and be liable to attachment and punishment as for a contempt.
